liburbi
Class UClient

java.lang.Object
  liburbi.UClient

public class UClient
extends java.lang.Object

The UClient class is the main class of the Java URBI library. Instanciating an object of this class means to open a connection to the URBI server and to process command.

Author:
Bastien Saltel

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

UClient

public UClient(java.lang.String host)
Default constructor for UClient. Initializes buflen to URBI_BUFLEN, port to URBI_PORT (54000), allocates recvBuffer, sendBuffer, parser and callbackSupport. Finally connects to the given hostname at the URBI_PORT.

Parameters:
host - The hostname to connect to.

UClient

public UClient(java.lang.String host,
               int port,
               int buflen)
Constructor for UClient. Allocates recvBuffer, sendBuffer, parser and callbackSupport and connects to the given hostname at the given port.

Parameters:
host - The hostname to connect to.
port - The port to connect to.
buflen - The length of the buffer.
